alert.note: Alert for Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:37PM CDT until July 18 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Madison County in north central Alabama... Moore County in Middle Tennessee... Lincoln County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 515 PM CDT * At 437 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Shelbyville to Lewisburg to 10 miles northeast of Pulaski, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Lynchburg, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Ardmore, Petersburg, Harvest, Tims Ford Lake, Lincoln and Elkwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
